name: Undine
description:
The tale of Undine retold as a sci-fi space adventure. Will your story end in wild romance, bitter vengeance, or horrible death?

  • Three protagonist genders (male, female, non-binary)
  • Three romanceable characters (male, female, non-binary)
  • Multitudes of endings and various twists and turns.

Developed for NaNoRenO 2017.

Word count: 4384
